Masks, testing & tracing will get our kids back in school & people back at work.

In the real world, rallies & press conferences don't actually help.

As businesses reopen & employees come back, they NEED fast, reliable testing & tracing ‚Äî most of which happens at the state & local level. 

They need kids back in school.

None of this works without funding for state & local governments.

But we can‚Äôt give up. Testing is not just about health but about jobs & schools. 

A Nobel laureate says each additional test supports 9 jobs. Germany keeps its schools open with constant testing. 

The President won‚Äôt do this so we have to support our governors.

OTOH, we spent billions on testing & sacrificed trillions in economic activity, but we‚Äôre going backward. Lack of a national strategy & commitment is to blame. 

People in WPA still waiting 7 days for test results because we never got WWII-level leadership to fix the supply chain
